game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on a journey to find the long-lost treasure buried deep within the mysterious island. Solve riddles, overcome obstacles, and face dangerous creatures to claim the bounty!

task.description: Explore the ancient cave to locate the hidden map that reveals the treasure's location.
Travel to the abandoned castle and retrieve the key to unlock the treasure chamber.
Battle against the ferocious guardian beast to gain access to the treasure.
